mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (item_id, name, exp, price, dc_rt, item_dc_amt, origin, point_fl, cpn_elg_fl, ship_type, seller_name, pkg_type, capa, sell_unit, adult_verif_fl, cate_code, item_qty, bsns_no, item_spec) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{name}, #{exp}, #{price}, #{dcRt}, #{itemDcAmt}, #{origin}, #{pointFl}, #{cpnElgFl}, #{shipType}, #{sellerName}, #{pkgType}, #{capa}, #{sellUnit}, #{adultVerifFl}, #{cateCode}, #{itemQty}, #{bsnsNo}, #{itemSpec})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name = #{name}, exp= #{exp}, price = #{price}, dc_rt = #{dcRt}, item_dc_amt = #{itemDcAmt}, origin = #{origin},point_fl = #{pointFl}, cpn_elg_fl = #{cpnElgFl}, ship_type = #{shipType}, seller_name = #{sellerName}, pkg_type = #{pkgType}, capa = #{capa}, sell_unit = #{sellUnit}, adult_verif_fl = #{adultVerifFl}, cate_code = #{cateCode}, item_qty =#{itemQty}, bsns_no = #{bsnsNo}, item_spec = #{itemSpec}, stdy_seller_fl = #{stdySellerFl} WHERE item_id=#{itemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_announcement (item_id, item_ann, item_ann_cate) VALUES (#{itemId},#{itemAnn},#{itemAnnCate})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT keyword FROM search_keyword WHERE keyword=#{keyword})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_image (img, rep_img_fl, item_id) VALUES (#{img}, #{repImgFl}, #{itemId})
